name: Hair Scare Routine
description:
This is a game made by Iain Harrison and Lena Van on the 4th of October 2020 for a self set game a day challenge similar to Inktober.

The game took around 45 minutes to develop and 2  hours to create the art.

All art was made by Lena Van.

The game was build in unity by Iain Harrison.
